titleStmt.title: AutoCAD Drawing Interchange Format, v. R12 (ASCII)

info.p: Version R12 of the AutoCAD DXF format appears to be stable, open, and widespread. As a text-based format, it is advocated by several CLARIN centres.
See the following for more information:

li.a: DANS description of R12 and others

ul.li: LoC info on the DXF format family, with references to multiple versions identified by PRONOM
